title: [US-001 BE] Implement /api/v1/sessions/:sessionKey/tasks POST endpoint
description: Implement the API endpoint to accept POST requests with the specified JSON schema for task creation.
acceptance_criteria: API endpoint accepts POST requests with the correct JSON schema. Task data is persisted to the PostgreSQL database. Redis pub/sub is used for real-time updates. Typecheck passes

title: [US-008 FE] Implement UI for editing pending tasks
description: Implement UI elements for editing tasks in pending state.
acceptance_criteria: Pending tasks show an edit button in the UI. Users can update subject, description, and priority. Users can add or remove file attachments. Users can delete the pending task entirely. Edit/delete buttons are hidden for non-pending tasks. Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-002 FE] Visualize Task Dependencies in UI
description: Display visual representations of task dependencies (blocks/blockedBy) in the UI.
acceptance_criteria: The UI displays visual cues indicating which tasks block or are blocked by other tasks. Clicking on a task shows its dependencies in the detail panel. Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-009 BE] Implement API to query pending user tasks
description: Implement API endpoint /api/v1/tasks?status=pending&source=user for ClawdBot to query user-created backlog tasks.
acceptance_criteria: API endpoint returns a list of pending tasks created by the user. Typecheck passes

title: [US-005 BE] Implement API to serve file attachments
description: Implement API endpoint to serve file attachments.
acceptance_criteria: API endpoint serves file attachments with correct content types. Typecheck passes

title: [US-001 FE] Display Real-Time Tasks on Kanban Board
description: Display tasks pushed from ClawdBot in real-time on a Kanban board.
acceptance_criteria: Tasks appear on the Kanban board within 2 seconds of being pushed via the API. The Kanban board displays tasks grouped by status (Pending, In Progress, Completed). Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-009 BE] Implement API for creating tasks from UI
description: Implement API endpoint to allow creation of new tasks from the UI.
acceptance_criteria: API endpoint accepts task creation requests with subject, description, priority, and session. New tasks are created with status: pending and source: user. Typecheck passes

title: [US-005 FE] Display Task Details and Files in UI
description: Display detailed information about each task, including file attachments, in a detail panel.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking on a task opens a detail panel. The detail panel displays the task subject, description, status, and dependencies. File attachments are listed with their names and content types. Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-003 FE] List Active Sessions in Sidebar
description: Display all active ClawdBot sessions in a sidebar.
acceptance_criteria: The sidebar lists all active sessions with session names. The sidebar displays an activity indicator for sessions with recent updates. Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-004 FE] Implement task search UI
description: Implement a search bar in the UI to search historical tasks.
acceptance_criteria: A search bar is available in the UI. Search results are displayed in the UI. Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-002 BE] Add task dependency fields to Task model
description: Add blocks and blockedBy fields to the Task data model and database schema.
acceptance_criteria: Task model includes blocks and blockedBy fields. Database schema is updated accordingly. Typecheck passes

title: [US-006] Create Docker Compose file
description: Create a Docker Compose file for deploying the application, PostgreSQL, and Redis.
acceptance_criteria: Running docker-compose up starts the application, PostgreSQL, and Redis. The application is accessible in a web browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-008 BE] Implement API for editing pending tasks
description: Implement API endpoints for editing tasks in pending state.
acceptance_criteria: API endpoints allow updating subject, description, priority. API endpoints allow adding/removing file attachments. API endpoint allows deleting the pending task entirely. Typecheck passes

title: [US-009 FE] Implement UI for creating new tasks
description: Implement a New Task button and form in the UI.
acceptance_criteria: A New Task button is available in the UI. Users can specify subject, description, priority, and session in the creation form. Users can attach files during task creation. New tasks are created with status: pending and source: user. Verify in browser. Typecheck passes

title: [US-007] Implement Ngrok Tunnel
description: Implement automatic public URL generation using Ngrok.
acceptance_criteria: On startup, the application creates an Ngrok tunnel. The public URL is displayed in the console output. The application remains accessible via the Ngrok URL. Typecheck passes

title: [US-000] Project Setup - TypeScript, Express, React, PostgreSQL, Redis
description: Initialize the project with Node.js, TypeScript, Express server, React client, PostgreSQL schema, and Redis connection.
acceptance_criteria: package.json with all dependencies. TypeScript configs for server and client. PostgreSQL schema with sessions, tasks, task_files tables. Redis connection module. Express server skeleton. React app skeleton with TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui. Typecheck passes

title: [US-004 BE] Implement task search API
description: Implement API endpoint to search historical tasks within the last 30 days.
acceptance_criteria: A search API endpoint is implemented. Search results include tasks from the past 30 days. Search results display relevant task details. Typecheck passes
